description: Filscan is a comprehensive blockchain explorer for the Filecoin network, enabling users to search and analyze blockchain messages, blocks, and accounts. It provides detailed insights into network parameters like token circulation and power distribution, serving token holders and storage providers. The platform offers real-time statistics and specialized tools for monitoring node performance, resource consumption, and balances. Filescan undergoes frequent upgrades to maintain network alignment and optimize functionality.
additional_impact:
Beyond its technical features, Filscan has established itself as essential infrastructure for the Filecoin ecosystem. The testimonials in previous responses demonstrate that Filscan is a trusted and accountable data source for developers building on Filecoin. Its verified, real-time network information across both Calibration and Mainnet enables developers to build applications, validate transactions, and make informed technical decisions with confidence.
With approximately 6,500 monthly visits, Filscan demonstrates the Filecoin community's consistent reliance on it for network data and analysis. This combination of high engagement and developer trust positions Filscan as more than a block explorer—it functions as critical infrastructure that enables transparency, accountability, and informed decision-making throughout the Filecoin ecosystem.
end_user:
Filscan serves multiple user groups within the Filecoin ecosystem:

•Token holders who need to track their holdings, monitor token circulation, and verify transactions

•Storage providers who require tools to monitor node performance, resource consumption, and their power distribution within the network

•Developers and analysts who need comprehensive blockchain data for research and development purposes

•General users seeking transparency and real-time statistics about the Filecoin network
testimonials:
1. Filscan supports 0x addresses for multisig wallets, enhancing accessibility for Ethereum-compatible tools.
 https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/CRK2LKYHW/p1753952501293269?thread_ts=1753951959.305599&cid=CRK2LKYHW

2.Fixed critical synchronization problems that affected large-scale data processing and network visibility.
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/D0929EQAQUV/p1750401335233369

3.Filscan uniquely converts Filecoin f1 addresses to Ethereum 0x addresses.
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/C06U1GXLRLH/p1754378220887179?thread_ts=1754378116.151199&cid=C06U1GXLRLH

4.Filscan has been upgraded promptly for every network upgrade, maintaining uninterrupted service and compatibility.
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/CRK2LKYHW/p1744068534083219?thread_ts=1743535510.997309&cid=CRK2LKYHW
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/C0717TGU7V2/p1746502042235189?thread_ts=1746489968.571339&cid=C0717TGU7V2

5.Filscan served as a key tool for confirming Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM) functionality during network upgrades.
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/C05P37R9KQD/p1733248124891649?thread_ts=1732147730.649389&cid=C05P37R9KQD

6.Filscan is highly recommended by key Filecoin developers as the go-to tool for community statistics and network analysis
https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/CEHTVSEG6/p1676795243898289?thread_ts=1676790758.011919&cid=CEHTVSEG6
